title: Redesigned $10 Bill To Feature Female Face, Treasury Announces
teaser: It's the first time a woman will be on U.S. paper currency since the late 1800s, when Martha Washington was on a special $1 bill. The Treasury will announce who'll be on the $10 bill later this year.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
